ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [88:20] And the earth, how it was laid out flat?, and thus infer from this the power of God, exalted be He, and His   Oneness? The commencing with the [mention of] camels is because they are closer in contact with it [the earth] than any other [animal]. As for His words sutihat, ‘laid out flat’, this on a literal reading suggests that the earth is flat, which is the opinion of most of the scholars of the [revealed] Law, and not a sphere as astronomers (ahl al-hay’a) have it, even if this [latter] does not contradict any of the pillars of the Law.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the earth, how it is spread) over water? All these are signs for them.
